meanings.definition: Full of or covered with thorns
meanings.sent1: The rose bush in the garden is the thorniest plant.
meanings.sent2: Be careful when handling the thorniest cactus in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The thorniest part of the hedgehog costume poked me.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the thorniest bushes felt like a prickly maze.
meanings.sent5: The thorniest branches scratched my arms as I walked by.

meanings.definition: Difficult or challenging to deal with
meanings.sent1: The thorniest math problem took me hours to solve.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with the thorniest customer complaints requires patience.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the thorniest knots in my shoelaces was frustrating.
meanings.sent4: Overcoming the thorniest obstacles in life makes us stronger.
meanings.sent5: The thorniest decisions are often the most important ones to make.
